definitions.definition: To persist steadfastly in pursuit of an undertaking , task , journey , or goal , even if hindered by distraction , difficulty , obstacles , or discouragement .
To stay constant ; to continue in a certain state; to remain .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To persist steadfastly in pursuit of an undertaking , task , journey , or goal , even if hindered by distraction , difficulty , obstacles , or discouragement .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , copulative , obsolete ) To stay constant ; to continue in a certain state; to remain .
